name: Fashion Design Courses( summer Camp school)
about: This a basically a online course platform for summer vacation student.This full site create with MERN stack. There a some admin role. If any user register our site by default there role was student. If admin want then he can make user as an instructor.Instructor can add courses, update courses,or delete course from client site.When they upload courses by default status of course will pending.When admin approve course then this course will show ui and instructor dashboard also with status update.If admin deny course then admin can add feedback why he or she deny the course.This feedback will show in instructors dashboard with deny status with admin feedback

name: Kids toy vendor( Only for seller )
about: This a kid toy vendor site only for seller.When seller login with there seller account then he or she can able to upload a product update a product or delete a product in client side.Other wish they can access those feature.Without Login they can only able to show all seller product. There are some private route if seller want to see his products then he or she must be login first to see there product (If they upload before)
